comment: /**  * Returns code that represents the snapshot state  *  * @return code for the state  */
code: /**  * Returns code that represents the snapshot state  *  * @return code for the state  */ public byte value() {     return value. }

comment: /**  * Returns true if snapshot completed (successfully or not)  *  * @return true if snapshot completed, false otherwise  */
code: /**  * Returns true if snapshot completed (successfully or not)  *  * @return true if snapshot completed, false otherwise  */ public boolean completed() {     return completed. }

comment: /**  * Generate snapshot state from code  *  * @param value the state code  * @return state  */
code: /**  * Generate snapshot state from code  *  * @param value the state code  * @return state  */ public static SnapshotIndexShardStage fromValue(byte value) {     switch(value) {         case 0:             return INIT.         case 1:             return STARTED.         case 2:             return FINALIZE.         case 3:             return DONE.         case 4:             return FAILURE.         default:             throw new IllegalArgumentException("No snapshot shard stage for value [" + value + "]").     } }
